The question is:

"Who is Captain James Cook facts?"

The answer is:

Captain James Cook was an English navigator, cartographer and explorer. Born in 1728, he was a highly skilled mariner who became famous for his voyages to the South Pacific Ocean, culminating in his three substantial voyages to the South Pacific and Australia between 1768 and 1779. He is recognized as one of the greatest explorers of all time.
